author: Steven Bartus, VICE News
title: Sweden Thinks Herd Immunity Is the Answer to Coronavirus
description: The death rate from COVID-19 in Sweden is accelerating faster than that of neighboring countries.
content: As other countries around the world order lockdowns to stop the spread of COVID-19, Sweden is charting a different course: Its keeping schools and businesses open, with the idea that resistance to a disease comes when enough people in the general population h… [+1586 chars]
